value.name: Miss Shachiku and the Little Baby Ghost
value.original_name: 社畜さんは幼女幽霊に癒されたい。
value.overview: From sunup to sundown, Fushihara-san works ’round the clock. She spends so much time there that even the ghosts worry about her well-being! One night, Fushihara-san was working late as usual when a little ghost girl whispered to her, “Leave now”—an encounter that would change her life forever. Be healed by the heartwarming daily life of the cute little ghost and Fushihara-san!
